{{#endsWith 'abc' 'c'}} abc does end with c {{else}} nope {{/endsWith}}

{{#endsWith 'abc' 'd'}} abc does end with d {{else}} nope {{/endsWith}}

{{#eq page.flavor "delicious"}} They are delicious {{else}} They are NOT delicious {{/eq}}

{{#eq page.flavor "gross"}} They are gross {{else}} They are NOT gross {{/eq}}

{{#isInteger 5}} five is an integer {{else}} five is NOT an integer {{/isInteger}}

{{lowerCase '--Foo-Bar'}}

{{#includes page.keywords 'alpha'}} keywords include alpha {{else}} keywords do not include alpha {{/includes}}

{{#includes page.keywords 'zulu'}} keywords include zulu {{else}} keywords do not include zulu {{/includes}}
